help.title: Controls
gameControls: Give Up Button: Top-right button displayed during gameplay
Restart Game Button: Top-right button displayed during gameplay and game over
Keyboard Navigation: Tab to select, Enter to execute, Escape to cancel
Touch Operation: Tap buttons directly to operate
tips: Special bubbles can be dragged off-screen
help.bubbles: Normal(blue) Stone(gray) Iron(brown) Diamond(white) Pink(heal) Poison(green) Spike(chain) Rainbow(bonus) Clock(timestop) S(score) Electric(stun) Escape(moving)

accessibility.searchBarDesc: Enter keywords to search help content
accessibility.categoryListDesc: Navigate with arrow keys, Enter to select
accessibility.sceneEntered: Entered help scene. Press F1 for keyboard shortcuts.
